text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-3-1/" title="1 Chronicles 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-2/" title="1 Chronicles 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-3/" title="1 Chronicles 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-4/" title="1 Chronicles 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 *These* six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-5/" title="1 Chronicles 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-6/" title="1 Chronicles 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-7/" title="1 Chronicles 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-8/" title="1 Chronicles 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-9/" title="1 Chronicles 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 *These were* all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-10/" title="1 Chronicles 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And Solomon's son *was* Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-11/" title="1 Chronicles 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-12/" title="1 Chronicles 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-13/" title="1 Chronicles 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-14/" title="1 Chronicles 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Amon his son, Josiah his son.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-15/" title="1 Chronicles 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And the sons of Josiah *were*, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-16/" title="1 Chronicles 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-17/" title="1 Chronicles 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-18/" title="1 Chronicles 3:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-19/" title="1 Chronicles 3:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And the sons of Pedaiah *were*, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-20/" title="1 Chronicles 3:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-21/" title="1 Chronicles 3:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-22/" title="1 Chronicles 3:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-23/" title="1 Chronicles 3:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-3-24/" title="1 Chronicles 3:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 And the sons of Elioenai *were*, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
